MAIN_PROMPT:
You are my sunshine, my only sunshine.
You make me happy when skies are gray.
You’ll never know, dear, how much I love you;
please don’t take my sunshine
SIM_PROMPTS:
You are my bright light, my dearest bright light.
You lift my spirits when the skies turn gray.
You may not realize, love, how deeply I care for you;
please don’t let that bright light go

You are the river, a silver river
You murmur softly as you weave and sway
I find my peace where your waters glimmer
Please don’t let your whisper fade
